body_html:
Here: https://pytorch.org/docs/master/torch.html#torch.set_printoptions
it says "precision – Number of digits of precision for floating point output (default = 8)." which made me think the default was actually 8 (and I didn't find any torch.get_printoptions)

It also seems quite strange that 1e-05 and 2e-05 get printed differently at precision 4, since the number of digits to be printed in scientific notation is the same.

body:
Here: https://pytorch.org/docs/master/torch.html#torch.set_printoptions
it says "precision – Number of digits of precision for floating point output (default = 8)." which made me think the default was actually 8 (and I didn't find any `torch.get_printoptions`)

It also seems quite strange that 1e-05 and 2e-05 get printed differently at precision 4, since the number of digits to be printed in scientific notation is the same.
